item.title: Diving Into WebGL
item.description: My Lovely Rotating Cube I’ve been spending some time wrapping my head around graphics programming lately. After a week of wrestling with JavaScript in Hugo and studying WebGL and GLSL, I’ve made it all the way to a rotating, lit cube! It doesn’t look like much, but I’ve learned a ton! Even this simple example required understanding a huge variety of concepts. I’m manipulating and applying matrices for coordinate system conversion, keeping matrix calculations on the CPU where possible.
